Attributes.description: Real-time, fully-integrated, conceptual and detailed design experiences that address an ill-structured, socially and technically complex environmental engineering problem for communities with consideration to the cultural history and needs of the communities.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of ENVE 202, ENVE 203. (and Third-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Frank, Room: Forward
